1231:6: prīṇantyeva vi + + + + hi śiśoḥ prāyaḥ pitṛṇāṃ manaḥ||
1231:11: sa cānubhavāvasito'sati bādhake pratyakṣasidvo hetorāśrayāsidviṃ nihanti|
1231:12: nanu bhavadbhirasannevāvayavī pratijñāyate sa kathaṃ pratyakṣasidvaḥ|
1231:13: nāvayavinamiha dharmmiṇaṃ pratipannāḥ smaḥ kintu pratibhāsamānasthūla nīlādikamartham|
1231:14: na tarhi virudvadharmmasaṃsargādavayavina ekatvaṃ niṣidvaṃ syāt|
1231:28: na paramāṇusañcayavādināṃ sthūlākāraḥ kaścidartho'sti yaḥ prasidvo dharmmī syāditi|
1231:29: avayavyanabhyupagame'pi hi niravayavānekātmakaḥ sthūlo'rthobhyupagamyamānaḥ kena niṣidvaḥ|
1231:30: syānmataṃ niravayavāḥ paramāṇavaḥ kathaṃ pratyakṣe sthūlenā kāreṇāvabhāseran,
1231:33: paramāṇava eva hi pararūpadeśaparihāreṇotpannāḥ parasparasahitā avabhāsamānā deśavitānavanto bhāsante|
1231:35: yattuktaṃ sthūlasūkṣmayorvirodha iti tat kiṃ pararūpadeśaparihāravatī niravayavānāmutpattiḥ|
1231:38: ataeva niravayaveṣu bahuṣvekasmin vijñāne pratibhāsa māneṣu bhavan pratibhāsakālabhāvī pratibhāsadharmmaḥ sthūlākāro na tu vāstavaḥ pratyekamabhāvāt|
1231:39: pratibhāsāt prāgūrdvaṃ vā na tarhi sthūlo'rtha iti cet|
1231:40: na tadāpi pratibhāsayogyatāsambhavāt yadaiva hi sañcitā bhaveyustadaiva pratibhāsayogyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ|
1231:46: tadayaṃ nirantara eka eva sthalo niravayavānekātmako bhavitumarhati,
1231:57: tatrāpi kimeṣāmantaraṃ vivekaḥ pararūpaśūnyatā veti cintyaṃ|
1231:60: nanu ca na pratyekaṃ paramāṇūnāṃ sthūlākāraḥ|
1231:62: yathā ca nīlaparamāṇūnāṃ pratyekamasambhavan pītākāro bahuṣvapi na dṛśyate|
1231:63: tathā pratyekamasambhavan sthūlākāraḥ kathaṃ bahuṣu syāditi|
1231:66: tataḥ pītavirudvaṃ nīlākāraṃ vibhrāṇeṣu bahuṣvapi kathaṃ pītākāro bhavet|
1231:68: tadevaṃ pratyakṣasidvaḥ sthūlo'rtha iha dharmmīti vyavasthitaṃ|
1231:69: tadevamavasthite dharmmiṇi hetoḥ sattvamasattvaṃ vā nirūpyaṃ|
1231:70: tatra pāṇyādāvekasmin kampamāne sthūlo'rthaḥ sakampaniḥkampe rūpe yugapat pratipadyamānaḥ kathaṃ virudvadharmmasaṃsargavānna syāt|
1231:74: iha ca sakampaniḥkampe rūpe gṛhṇat pratyakṣameva sāmarthyāt parasparābhāvaṃ sādhayati|
1231:76: syādetat pāṇyādāvekasminnavayave kampamāne nāvayavinaḥ kampa rūpamabhyupeyaṃ|
1231:77: avayava eva hi tadā kriyāvān dṛśyate|
1231:80: yathā rathe calati tadā rūḍho'pi calatīti|
1231:86: yadā tu śarīrakampanārthaḥ prayatnaviśeṣa ātmano jāyate|
1231:88: ato bhinnamiti tayorekasmin jāte kathaṃ nimittāntarapratibadvajanmā tadabhāve tadaparo'pi tathaiva jāyeta|
1231:89: ratha tadārūḍhakarmmaṇostu satyapi nimittabhede nimittayaugapadyāt sahabhāvaḥ|
1231:92: tayośca sahabhāvāt karmmaṇī api yaugapadyena jāyete|
1231:97: tena ca saṃyoge'samavāyikāraṇe nivarttate nivarttetāvayavi dravyamiti|
1231:106: anyathāvayavasaṃsṛṣṭebhya ākāśadeśebhyo vibhāgo'vayavāsaṃsṛṣṭeśca saṃyogovayavinaḥ kriyāvataḥ syāt|
1231:114: tasmādavayavini kriyāvati avayavāḥ kriyāvanta ityakāmakairapi vaiśeṣikairidamabhyupeyaṃ|
1231:115: yathā cāvayavikriyāyāmavayavāḥ kriyāvanta stathāvayaveṣvapi kriyāvatsu tadavayavaiḥ kriyāvadbhirbhāvyamiti|
1231:116: anayā diśā dvyaṇuke kriyāvati tadārambhakau paramāṇūkriyāvantau mantavyau|
1231:121: ekasya paramāṇoḥ kriyā na parasyeti cet|
1231:124: evañca bdyaṇukadravyasya kriyāvattve tryaṇuke'pi kriyā syādityanena krameṇa paridṛśyamāno'calaścalaḥ syādavayavaḥ|
1231:128: sāvayavo hi bhāva ekenāvayavena vastvantarasaṃyukta evāvayavāntarai ścalaiḥ|
1231:132: tathāhyāvṛte ekasmin pāṇyādau sthūlasyārthasyāvṛtānāvṛte rūpe yugapadbhavantī virudvadharmmadvayasaṃyogamasyāvedayataḥ|
1231:143: na cārdvāvaraṇe bhūyasāmavayavānāmastīndriyasannikarṣaḥ tato na sthūlagrahaṇamiti|
1231:149: atha sthūlatvākhyaḥ parimāṇaviśeṣo guṇaḥ sa drabyādanya eveti cet|
1231:156: yadyevaṃ sa eva tarhyavayavaḥ svena parimāṇena sambadvaḥ pratyakṣostvāvaraṇakālenāvayavī|
1231:159: yasya hi mahato'vayavasya tata parimāṇaṃ sa tāvat svena parimāṇena sambadvaḥ pratibhāti|
1231:160: avayavinaśca tatparimāṇasambadvapratibhāsābhyupagame dvayoḥ samaparimāṇayorayavāyavavinoḥ pratibhāsa āsajyate|
1231:163: syādetadyasyāvayavasya parimāṇenāvayavī sambadvaḥ pratibhāti sa svaṃ parimāṇaṃ parityajyābhātīti|
1231:166: na ca bādhakamantareṇa bhrāntirapi śakyā vyavasthāpayitum|
1231:169: paramadhyāvarttināmavayavānāmindriyasannikarṣābhāve sthūlatamāvayavidarśanānupapatteḥ syānmataṃ nikhilā vayavadarśanaṃ na sthūlapratyakṣakāraṇaṃ|
1231:173: tato na yāvanniravaśeṣāvayavadarśanaṃ tāvat kathaṃ sthūlatamārthapratipattiḥ syāt|
1231:176: krameṇa diśāmavayavānāṃ pratyakṣīkaraṇe pratyakṣaḥ sthūlo'vayavīti cet|
1231:177: anyadā tu kaḥ pratyakṣaḥ iti vimṛṣyaṃ|
1231:179: avayavī api paramadhyavarttino na yugapaddṛśyanta iti kathaṃ so'pi pratyakṣaḥ syāt|
1231:180: tadevaṃ nāvayavī nāvayavāḥ pratyakṣā iti na kiñcidṛśyeteti|
1231:183: tathā hyekasminnukte sthulo'rtho raktārakte rūpe yugapat pratipadyamāno virudvarūpadvayayogamātmanaḥ prakāśayati|
1231:184: nanva vayava eva rakto'vayavī tvaraktaikarūpa eveti|
1231:188: avayavasya ca rāgadravyeṇa saṃyoge'vayavino'pi tena bhāvyaṃ|
1231:189: avaśyaṃ hi kāraṇasaṃyoginā kāryyamapi saṃyujyata iti samayāt|
1231:191: asti hi kuṅkumārakte paṭāvayave kuṅkumāraktaḥ paṭa iti pratyayaḥ|
1231:192: tato rāgadravyasaṃyukta evāvayavīti tasyāpi varṇāntarānavabhāsaḥ syādavayavinaḥ|
1231:193: rāgadravyaṃ hi pratyāsīdat nijarūpaṃ vastuna stirodhatte svena ca rūpeṇa dravyaṃ sambandhati|
1231:194: yathā raktovayavastirohitasahajarūpo rāgadravyasamavāyinā rūpeṇa sambandhī pratibhāti|
1231:202: yadi hi svāśraye samaveto rūpādivat vyāpyavṛttirevāyaṃ|
1231:208: abhāvo hi bhāvanivṛttirūpo nāsya bhāvanivṛttiṃ hitvā rūpāntaramīkṣate|
1231:209: yaśca yannivṛttirūpaḥ sa kathaṃ tasmin satyeva bhavati|
1231:211: tathā hyanalaṃ paśyannapi salilārthī tatra pravartteta|
1231:215: nanu tatra yadi jalaṃ syādupalabhyeta kimataḥ|
1231:223: tatra bhāvanivṛttirūpe 'bhāve sidve kathaṃ bhāvopalabdhirna bhrāntā syāt|
1231:227: rūparasayostu na parasparanivṛttī rūpamiti kathaṃ tadudāharaṇamiha śobheta|
1231:236: iha tāvadekasmin deśe paricchidyamāne tādrūpyapracyutirasya vyavacchidyate|
1231:239: yadi hi paricchidyamāno deśāntarasvabhāvo bhavettadā tadrūpa evopalabdho bhavet|
1231:240: deśāntararūpantu virahayya svena rūpeṇa prakāśamāno deśo deśāntarāsaṃsṛṣṭa ityavasīyate|
1231:241: yathā ca deśasya deśāntarāsaṃsargastathā tenādhārabhūtena deśena yadyāptaṃ rūpaṃ tadapi deśāntarasaṃsargādavicchinnaṃ bhavati|
1231:242: kathaṃ hi tena deśena vyāptaṃ rūpaṃ tadabhāvavati deśāntare vartteta|
1231:243: yathā ekena deśena vyāpto ghaṭo na deśāntare varttate|
1231:247: yaduta ekadeśavyāptaṃ rūpaṃ na deśāntare varttate iti|
1231:249: tadabhāvavati deśāntare varttamāno'pi tena deśena vyāpyeta|
1231:256: tathāhi bhāvābhāvāveva parasparaparihāreṇa virudvau na vastunī|
1231:258: tena yadeva vastu vastvantarapracyutimat tadeva tena virudvaṃ|
1231:261: ekakāryyanirvarttanaśaktimati ca rūpe gṛhyamāṇe kāryyāntara nirvarttanaśaktirapi paricchidyata iti|
1231:264: yathātyanta sadṛśorvastunoryugapadupalabhyamānayoḥ satyapi cākārabhede dūrādanupalakṣyamāṇabhedayordeśabhedamātranimittakaṃ pratyakṣāvasitaṃ virodhamāśritya bhedo'vasthāpyate|
1231:266: yathaikaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ bhinneṣu cakṣurādiṣu varttate tadadhīnotpādatayā|
1231:268: so'pi deśabhedanimitte virodhe'vasthāpyamāne vastunaḥ kāraṇabhedanimittaṃviro dhamāsañjayan na naipuṇyamātmano nivedayati|
1231:279: tadevaṃ kamparāgāvaraṇabhāvābhāvakṛte deśabhedanibandhane ca caturthe virudvadharmmasaṃsarge'vayaviviṣaye vyavasthāpite pakṣadharmmatvaṃ sidvaṃ hetoḥ|
1231:284: tato virudvadharmmasaṃsarge'pi bhavannabhedavyavahāro vyāpakaṃ nimittavattvaṃ jahyāt|
